instructions.original_text: Preheat the oven to 375*

task.action_name: Preheat the oven

instructions.original_text: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat. Add olive oil and swirl to coat the pan. Add the ground beef and break apart. Once halfway cooked, stir in the taco seasoning. Remove from heat and place into a bowl.

tasks.action_name: Heat skillet
output_quality: Pan should be over medium-high heat.

tasks.action_name: Add olive oil and swirl
output_quality: Coat the pan evenly.

tasks.action_name: Add ground beef
output_quality: Break apart the beef.

tasks.action_name: Stir in taco seasoning
output_quality: Ensure even distribution of seasoning

tasks.action_name: Remove from heat
output_quality: Beef should be halfway cooked.

tasks.action_name: Place into a bowl

instructions.original_text: Lay gorditas out on a rimmed baking sheet. Cover each evenly with shredded cheddar cheese and place into the oven to melt for 4 minutes.

task.action_name: Lay gorditas on baking sheet
output_quality: Cover with shredded cheddar cheese.

task.action_name: Place in the oven
output_quality: Melt for 4 minutes.

instructions.original_text: Prepare the spicy ranch while the cheese is melting. Add all ingredients to a mixing bowl and whisk well to combine.

task.action_name: Prepare spicy ranch
output_quality: All ingredients are mixed well.

failure: Spices and mayonnaise not mixed together well

instructions.original_text: Once cheese has melted on the gorditas, remove them from the oven and place onto a taco stand to help hold the shape. Add the hard shell tortilla over the cheese. Scoop taco meat into the center of the hard shell tortilla. Top with spicy ranch, shredded lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

task.action_name: Remove gorditas from the oven
output_quality: Place on a taco stand.

task.action_name: Assemble the Cheesy Gordita Crunch
output_quality: Add hard shell tortilla over the cheese.
Scoop taco meat onto the tortilla.
Top with spicy ranch, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, and cheese.

instructions.original_text: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium-high heat until no pink remains. Drain any excess fat.

task.action_name: cook ground beef over medium-high heat until no pink remains
output_quality: Beef should be cooked with no pink and excess oil drained

instructions.original_text: Add ⅓ cup of water and taco seasoning to the skillet.

tasks.action_name: Add water and chill powder, cumin, black pepper, onion powder, dried oregano, salt, garlic powder, and red pepper flakes to ground beef in skillet
output_quality: Spice should be added

tasks.action_name: Stir and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until thickened.
output_quality: Meat spice mixture should be thickened
Meat spice mixture should be stirred for 5 minutes

failure: Meat spice mixture is cooked for less than 5 minutes
Meat spice mixture is not thickened

instructions.original_text: Meanwhile, cut one of the flour tortillas into quarters. Use kitchen scissors or a knife to round the corners.

tasks.action_name: Cut 1 flour tortilla into quarters
output_quality: Flour tortilla should be in 4 quarters

failure: Flour tortilla is cut into less than 4 pieces
Flour tortilla is cut into more than 4 pieces
Flour tortilla is cut into 4 unequal pieces

tasks.action_name: Use kitchen scissors or a kinife to round the corners
output_quality: 4 quarters should have rounded corners

instructions.original_text: Place the remaining four tortillas on a plate and cover them with a damp paper towel. Microwave them for 20-30 seconds or until they are warm.

tasks.action_name: Place the remaining flour tortillas on a plate
output_quality: Flour tortillas should be on the plate

failure: Flour tortillas are not on the plate

tasks.action_name: Cover the flour tortillas with a damp paper towel
output_quality: Flour tortillas should be covered with a damp paper towel

failure: Paper towel isn't placed on tortillas

tasks.action_name: Microwave them for 20-30 seconds or until they are warm
output_quality: Microwaved for 20-30 seconds
Tortillas are warm

instructions.original_text: Add ¼ cup ground beef to the center of each tortilla. Top with cheese sauce. Add tostada shell, sour cream, lettuce, tomato, and cheese blend.

tasks.action_name: Add ¼ cup ground beef to the center of each tortilla.
output_quality: Warm flour tortillas should have beef in center

tasks.action_name: Top with cheese sauce
output_quality: Tortillas with beef should be covered with cheese sauce

failure: Cheese sauce is not on tortillas

tasks.action_name: Add tostada shell, sour cream, lettuce, tomato, and cheese blend
output_quality: Tostada shell, sour cream, lettuce, tomato, and cheese blend are added

failure: Tostada shell, sour cream, lettuce, tomato, and cheese blend are not added

instructions.original_text: Place the quartered tortilla in the center and gently fold the larger tortilla around it to seal.

tasks.action_name: Place the quartered tortilla in the center
output_quality: Filled tortilla should have quartered tortilla placed on top

failure: Quartered tortilla is not in filled tortilla

tasks.action_name: gently fold the larger tortilla around it to seal
output_quality: Larger tortilla on bottom should be folded upwards to seal everything

instructions.original_text: In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat.

tasks.action_name: Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil over medium heat
output_quality: Vegetable oil should be heated

instructions.original_text: In batches, add the folded tortillas seam side down, to the skillet and cook until golden, about 3-4 minutes. Flip and cook the other side.

tasks.action_name: Place sealed tortillas with filling, seam side down, to the skillet for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown
output_quality: Seam side of sealed tortilla should be golden brown

failure: Tortilla isn't golden brown on seam side

tasks.action_name: Flip and cook the other side for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown.
output_quality: Other side of sealed tortilla should be golden brown

failure: Tortilla isn't golden brown on other side

instructions.original_text: Add all ingredients to a small bowl. Stir well to combine. Set aside.

task.action_name: Add all ingredients to a small bowl
output_quality: Ingredients are in bowl

task.action_name: Stir ingredients in bowl well
output_quality: Ingredients are mixed well.

instructions.original_text: Salt & pepper chicken breast on both sides. Heat 1 1/2 Tbsp of vegetable oil over medium-high heat in a skillet. Add chicken breast and cook until done (when internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F). Remove chicken from skillet and thinly slice.

task.action_name: Season Chicken Breast
output_quality: Chicken breast has salt and pepper on both sides

task.action_name: Heat oil in a skillet
output_quality: Oil is heated in skillet

task.action_name: Add chicken breast in oil and cook until internal temperature of 165 F is reached
output_quality: Chicken breast is cooked with temperature 165 F

task.action_name: Remove chicken from skillet and thinly slice
output_quality: Chicken is sliced

instructions.original_text: Place tortilla on hot skillet. On one side of the tortilla, place 1/4 cup of the shredded cheese and 1/2 slice of American cheese. Place half of the chicken on top of the cheese.

task.action_name: Place tortilla on hot skillet
output_quality: Tortilla on hot skillet

task.action_name: To one side of the tortilla, add shredded cheese and a slice of american cheese
output_quality: Cheese on one side of the tortilla

task.action_name: Place half of the chicken on top of the cheese
output_quality: Chicken is placed on top of the cheese

instructions.original_text: On the other side, spread about 1.5 tablespoons of the sauce. Fold tortilla over and press gently with your spatula. Cook until cheese is melted and bubbly, 2-4 minutes each side.

task.action_name: On empty side of tortilla, spread 1.5 tablespoons of quesadilla sauce
output_quality: Tortilla has quesadilla sauce spread on empty side

task.action_name: Fold tortilla over and press gently with your spatula
output_quality: Tortilla is folded over

task.action_name: Cook until cheese is melted and bubbly, 2-4 minutes each side.
output_quality: Cook in skillet until cheese is melted and bubbly
Quesadilla is cooked for 2-4 minutes on each side

instructions.original_text: Use a pizza cutter to slice each quesadilla into 4 pieces.

task.action_name: Slice Quesadilla
output_quality: Quesadilla_is_sliced_in_4_equal_pieces

instructions.original_text: Add your refried beans to a small saucepan along with a couple tablespoons of water. Canned refried beans are usually pretty thick, so I like to thin mine out with a little water to make them more spreadable. How much water you use will depend on the consistency of your refried beans.

task.action_name: Add refried beans to the small saucepan
output_quality: Refried beans should be in the saucepan.

task.action_name: Add a couple tablespoons of water to the saucepan with the refried beans
output_quality: Water should be added to the refried beans in the saucepan.

task.action_name: Mix the refried beans and water
output_quality: Refried beans and water should be thoroughly mixed.

instructions.original_text: Mix the beans and water together well and place over medium heat. Cook beans until piping hot, turn the heat off and let sit with the lid on while you are preparing your flour tortillas.

task.action_name: Mix beans and water together well
output_quality: Beans and water should be thoroughly mixed.

task.action_name: Place mixed beans and water over medium heat
output_quality: Beans should be placed over medium heat.

task.action_name: Cook beans until piping hot
output_quality: Beans should be piping hot.

task.action_name: Turn off the heat and let the beans sit with the lid on
output_quality: Beans should sit with the lid on.

instructions.original_text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and add your flour tortilla. You don’t need to use any cooking spray for this, you just want to heat the tortilla. Heat tortilla on both sides until hot. Remove tortilla from the pan and place on a plate or cutting board.

task.action_name: Heat large pan over medium heat
output_quality: Pan should be heated over medium heat.

task.action_name: Add flour tortilla to the pan
output_quality: Tortilla should be placed in the pan.

task.action_name: Heat tortilla on both sides until hot
output_quality: Tortilla should be hot on both sides.

failure: Tortilla not heated enough on one or both sides

task.action_name: Remove tortilla from the pan
output_quality: Tortilla should be removed from the pan.

task.action_name: Place tortilla on a plate or cutting board
output_quality: Tortilla should be placed on a plate or cutting board.

failure: Tortilla not placed on plate or cutting board

instructions.original_text: If you want your cheese to be more melty, it’s important to move quickly while assembling your bean and cheese burrito so there isn’t much time for the refried beans or the tortilla to cool down.

task.action_name: Assemble bean and cheese burrito quickly
output_quality: Refried beans and tortilla should not cool down much.

failure: Refried beans or tortilla cool down significantly

instructions.original_text: Spread the middle of the tortilla with about 1/3 cup of the heated refried beans. Top with a handful of cheese, about 1 tablespoon of chopped onion and 1-2 tablespoons of the taco sauce. Fold the sides of your burrito in and carefully roll up. You can either enjoy immediately or let burrito cool for a few minutes, which will give the cheese a little more time to get melty. Enjoy with extra taco sauce, if desired!

task.action_name: Spread heated refried beans on the middle of the tortilla
output_quality: Tortilla should be evenly spread with refried beans.

failure: Refried beans unevenly spread on tortilla

task.action_name: Top with cheese, chopped onion, and taco sauce
output_quality: Tortilla should be topped evenly with cheese, chopped onion, and taco sauce.

task.action_name: Fold sides of the burrito in and carefully roll up
output_quality: Burrito should be neatly folded and rolled up.

failure: Burrito not folded or rolled up neatly

task.action_name: Enjoy immediately or let burrito cool for a few minutes
output_quality: Burrito can be enjoyed immediately or allowed to cool for a few minutes.

failure: Burrito not allowed to cool for a few minutes

instructions.original_text: Combine all of the sauce ingredients in a bowl and whisk well. Refrigerate until ready to use.

task.action_name: Combine sauce ingredients in a bowl
output_quality: Sauce ingredients should be thoroughly mixed.

task.action_name: Refrigerate sauce until ready to use
output_quality: Sauce should be refrigerated.

instructions.original_text: Heat oil in a medium pan, add onion, red pepper, green pepper, jalapeno, and saute until the veggies start to soften about 5 minutes. Add beans, taco seasoning, salt, and mix well. Add water and mix. Lightly mash with a potato masher. Garnish with cilantro. Reserve the filling.

task.action_name: Saute vegetables in oil until softened
output_quality: Vegetables should be softened.

task.action_name: Add beans, taco seasoning, salt, and water; mix well
output_quality: Ingredients should be thoroughly mixed.

task.action_name: Lightly mash filling with a potato masher
output_quality: Filling should be lightly mashed.

task.action_name: Garnish with cilantro
output_quality: Filling should be garnished with cilantro.

task.action_name: Reserve the filling
output_quality: Filling should be reserved for later use.

instructions.original_text: Add Kawan paratha on a preheated skillet and cook about 80%. Repeat with the second paratha. Fold both in the middle to form a semi-circle and place in a preheated air fryer. Cook at 350 F for 5 minutes. Carefully take out the crispy air-fried paratha shells with a silicone spatula. Continue to cook and air fry the remaining parathas.

task.action_name: Cook Kawan paratha on preheated skillet until 80% cooked
output_quality: Paratha should be 80% cooked.

task.action_name: Fold parathas in the middle to form semi-circles and place in preheated air fryer
output_quality: Parathas should be folded and placed in air fryer.

failure: Parathas not folded or placed in air fryer

task.action_name: Cook parathas in air fryer at 350 F for 5 minutes
output_quality: Parathas should be cooked at 350 F for 5 minutes.

task.action_name: Carefully remove crispy air-fried paratha shells with a silicone spatula
output_quality: Paratha shells should be carefully removed.

task.action_name: Continue to cook and air fry the remaining parathas
output_quality: Remaining parathas should be cooked and air fried.

failure: Remaining parathas not cooked or air fried

instructions.original_text: Take one of the folded parathas and evenly spread about ¼ cup of bean filling in the middle. Spread lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese on top. Drizzle 1 to 2 tablespoons of sauce on top and serve.

task.action_name: Evenly spread bean filling on the paratha
output_quality: Bean filling should be evenly spread.

task.action_name: Spread lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese on top
output_quality: Lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese should be evenly spread on top.

failure: Toppings not evenly spread on top

task.action_name: Drizzle sauce on top
output_quality: Sauce should be drizzled on top.
